price: Aho atazapfa (ngo aruhuke) cyangwa ngo agiriremo ubuzima (bwiza).
arabic: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحۡيَىٰ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: thumma lā yamūtu fīhā walā yaḥyā
